text: Wang Hai (; 19 January 1926 - 2 August 2020) was a Chinese retired fighter pilot and general. He was a flying ace of the Korean War. He was Commander of the People's Liberation Army Air Force (PLAAF) from 1985 to 1992. He was awarded the rank of general (shang jiang) in 1988. He was born in Shandong, China. Wang died on 2 August 2020 in Beijing, aged 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese generals Category:Aviators Category:People from Shandong Category:20th-century Chinese military people
title: Wang Hai
